# GitHub Security Jeopardy - Code Owners
# This file defines who owns and should review changes to specific parts of the repository

# Global ownership - all files require review from the repository owner
* @korytuyo

# Frontend components and game logic
/src/ @korytuyo

# Configuration files
/webpack.config.js @korytuyo
/staticwebapp.config.json @korytuyo
/package.json @korytuyo

# Documentation
/README.md @korytuyo

# GitHub workflows and security configurations
/.github/ @korytuyo

# Game data and questions - require extra review for accuracy
/src/data/ @korytuyo
